title: Middle- Eastern Server
body:
I know this has been requested quite often now and you may be bored of seeing such posts, but I wanna address the issues that Rioters mentioned in why they cant really add such server yet.

**Location**- It may be difficult to find the right location since you want the perfect ping for all countries around the server, but in my opinion, try to go for an area thats surrounded by areas with most players. Its also not that difficult to find a location. We would accept any ping below 80, it would be a huge difference to how we play currently with 120ms- 150.

**Language**- We dont all speak Arabic. Most of us do, but not all of us. You need to consider countries like UAE where a huge amount of people dont speak Arabic, and all countries have different "types" of Arabic. For example, People in Egypt dont speak the same as locals in UAE.
My point- IF you were to add an Arabic language, make sure to still include the regular English in the options.


If you eventually implement such server, it will certainly be filled with players within days. Tournaments will be made more often (Riot-less and *fingers crossed* Riot authorized) and League will become a much bigger deal here than it is currently.
Im just giving an idea, I really hope you decide to implement a server at some point. {{champion:32}}
